Airline.Text: Preparation 20 to 60 minutes, air time counts
Preparation: 20 to 120 minutes
Start #1 first; OETD, warm up, OETA, cool down
Start #1 first; warm up, cool down
Must have between 1.5T and 10T of fuel on landing
Must have between more 2243kg of fuel on landing
All PIREPs are reviewed
Preparation 20-40 minutes, air time counts
Warm up, cool down
Preparation 20-40 minutes, block time counts
Start #2 first; warm up, cool down
Flight time above 20%/20 minutes of scheduled requires review
Preparation 20-40 minutes, air time counts
Preparation 20-180 minutes, air time counts
Warm up, OETA, cool down
Preparation 20-50 minutes, block time counts
Start #1 first; OETD, warm up, OETA, cool down
Flight time above 30%/45 minutes of scheduled requires review
Must have at least 1000kg fuel on landing
Preparation 15-60 minutes, air time counts
Start #2 first; warm up
Flight time above 20%/20 minutes of scheduled requires review
Must have at least 998kg of fuel on landing
Preparation 15-40 minutes, block time counts
Start #1 first; warm up, OETA, cool down
Pause in flight requires PIREP comment
Must have at least 2000kg of fuel on landing
Worth pushing block time just above certain hour marks
